    • PlayController

      public PlayController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the fxml file has been loaded.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.

    • update

      private void update() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException
      Updates the status of the level (i.e. the flow of the game). It also paints the game in the GUI.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.

    • paint

      private void paint()
      Paints the level in the GUI.

    • onClick

      private void onClick​(Coordinate coord)
      Manages the click event, when a coordinate is clicked. When 2 coordinates has been clicked, then it tries to update the status of the level by moving the piece.
      Parameters:
      coord - Coordinate object that corresponds to the cell of the board that has been clicked.

    • onReload

      private void onReload() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException
      Reloads the current level of the game.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.
